bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a dian xian 癲癇 , peak-illness with epilepsy, which, at the time of its outbreaks, causes the patient’s four limbs to twitch, with a red face, heat below the heart, shortness of qi and a breathing that is weak and fast. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 5: 心癇之 為病，面赤，心下有熱，短氣息微數 , “The disease of heart epilepsy : a red face, heat below the heart, shortness of qi, weak and fast breathing”.
